problem.markdown: What is true for a control volume system? [ ] The volume remains unchanged [ ] The density remains unchanged [ ] The temperature remains unchanged [x] It must have at least one inlet or one exit across which mass is transferred. [explanation] If no mass can cross the boundaries of the system, it becomes a closed system or a control mass system [explanation]
problem.p: What is true for a control volume system?

checkboxgroup.choice: It must have at least one inlet or one exit across which mass is transferred.

div.p: If no mass can cross the boundaries of the system, it becomes a closed system or a control mass system
